page.title: 04GRANADA FERRYBRIDGE SERVICES
page.content: {The Granada Service-station was opened {on 2.4.85 at 11 a.m.It is situated at {the junction of the A1 and M62}near Knottingley to attract custom from both major roads.The building with its large sloping roof is modern in design and tastefully furnished.The services are open 24 hours a day,except for the shop which is open from 7.30a.m. to 10.30p.m. When the shop is closed goods may be purchased from the petrol station kiosk. Granada offers a wide range of food for its customers,the majority being more than satisfied with their meal. After a month business is already very brisk with an average of 1200 customers a day,although most of these do not use the cafeteria. {The services has provided 70 jobs for {local people mostly from Knottingley, {90% of them being female.
